mapper.select: SELECT MAST_CD, CD_NM_KOR, CD_NM_ENG, CD_DESC, USE_YN, INPT_DT, INPT_ID, INPT_IP, UPDT_DT, UPDT_ID, UPDT_IP FROM TB_CD_MASTER WHERE MAST_CD LIKE '%' || #{mastCd} || '%' AND CD_NM_KOR LIKE '%' || #{cdNmKor} || '%' AND USE_YN = NVL(#{useYn}, USE_YN) ORDER BY CD_NM_KOR

SELECT DETL_CD, MAST_CD, CD_NM_KOR, CD_NM_ENG, CD_DESC, SORT_SEQ, USE_YN, ATTR1, ATTR2, ATTR3, ATTR4, ATTR5, INPT_DT, INPT_ID, INPT_IP, UPDT_DT, UPDT_ID, UPDT_IP, ATTR6, ATTR7, ATTR8, ATTR9, ATTR10 FROM TB_CD_DETAIL WHERE MAST_CD = #{mastCd} AND DETL_CD LIKE '%' || #{detlCd} || '%' AND NVL(ATTR1, '1') LIKE DECODE(#{attr1}, NULL, '%', #{attr1}) AND NVL(ATTR2, '1') LIKE DECODE(#{attr2}, NULL, '%', #{attr2}) AND NVL(ATTR3, '1') LIKE DECODE(#{attr3}, NULL, '%', #{attr3}) AND NVL(ATTR4, '1') LIKE DECODE(#{attr4}, NULL, '%', #{attr4}) AND NVL(ATTR5, '1') LIKE DECODE(#{attr5}, NULL, '%', #{attr5}) AND NVL(ATTR6, '1') LIKE DECODE(#{attr6}, NULL, '%', #{attr6}) AND NVL(ATTR7, '1') LIKE DECODE(#{attr7}, NULL, '%', #{attr7}) AND NVL(ATTR8, '1') LIKE DECODE(#{attr8}, NULL, '%', #{attr8}) AND NVL(ATTR9, '1') LIKE DECODE(#{attr9}, NULL, '%', #{attr9}) AND NVL(ATTR10, '1') LIKE DECODE(#{attr10}, NULL, '%', #{attr10}) AND USE_YN = NVL(#{useYn}, USE_YN) ORDER BY SORT_SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CD_MASTER ( MAST_CD, CD_NM_KOR, CD_NM_ENG, CD_DESC, USE_YN, INPT_DT, INPT_ID, INPT_IP, UPDT_DT, UPDT_ID, UPDT_IP ) VALUES ( #{mastCd}, #{cdNmKor}, #{cdNmEng}, #{cdDesc}, #{useYn}, SYSDATE, #{sysUserId}, #{sysUserIp} , SYSDATE, #{sysUserId}, #{sysUserIp} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CD_MASTER SET CD_NM_KOR = NVL(#{cdNmKor}, CD_NM_KOR), CD_NM_ENG = NVL(#{cdNmEng}, CD_NM_ENG), CD_DESC = NVL(#{cdDesc}, CD_DESC), USE_YN = NVL(#{useYn}, USE_YN), UPDT_DT = SYSDATE , UPDT_ID = #{sysUserId} , UPDT_IP = #{sysUserIp} WHERE MAST_CD = #{mastCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CD_DETAIL ( MAST_CD, DETL_CD, CD_NM_KOR, CD_NM_ENG, CD_DESC, SORT_SEQ, USE_YN, ATTR1, ATTR2, ATTR3, ATTR4, ATTR5, ATTR6, ATTR7, ATTR8, ATTR9, ATTR10, INPT_DT, INPT_ID, INPT_IP, UPDT_DT, UPDT_ID, UPDT_IP ) VALUES ( #{mastCd}, #{detlCd}, #{cdNmKor}, #{cdNmEng}, #{cdDesc}, #{sortSeq}, #{useYn}, #{attr1}, #{attr2}, #{attr3}, #{attr4}, #{attr5}, #{attr6}, #{attr7}, #{attr8}, #{attr9}, #{attr10}, SYSDATE, #{sysUserId}, #{sysUserIp}, SYSDATE, #{sysUserId}, #{sysUserIp} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CD_DETAIL SET CD_NM_KOR = NVL(#{cdNmKor}, CD_NM_KOR), CD_NM_ENG = NVL(#{cdNmEng}, CD_NM_ENG), CD_DESC = NVL(#{cdDesc}, CD_DESC), SORT_SEQ = NVL(#{sortSeq}, SORT_SEQ), USE_YN = NVL(#{useYn}, USE_YN), ATTR1 = NVL(#{attr1}, ATTR1), ATTR2 = NVL(#{attr2}, ATTR2), ATTR3 = NVL(#{attr3}, ATTR3), ATTR4 = NVL(#{attr4}, ATTR4), ATTR5 = NVL(#{attr5}, ATTR5), ATTR6 = NVL(#{attr6}, ATTR6), ATTR7 = NVL(#{attr7}, ATTR7), ATTR8 = NVL(#{attr8}, ATTR8), ATTR9 = NVL(#{attr9}, ATTR9), ATTR10 = NVL(#{attr10}, ATTR10), UPDT_DT = SYSDATE , UPDT_ID = #{sysUserId} , UPDT_IP = #{sysUserIp} WHERE MAST_CD = #{mastCd} AND DETL_CD = #{detlCd}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_CD_DETAIL WHERE MAST_CD = #{mastCd} AND DETL_CD = #{detlCd}

SELECT GUBUN AS MAST_CD, CODE AS DETL_CD, CODE_NAME AS CD_NM_KOR, CODE AS ATTR1, REF_1 AS ATTR2, REF_2 AS ATTR3 FROM KOSCO.BCOD011 WHERE GUBUN = 'A005' AND CODE <> '0' AND USE_GUBUN <> '0'

SELECT GUBUN AS MAST_CD, CODE AS DETL_CD, CODE_NAME AS CD_NM_KOR, SYSTEM AS ATTR1, REF_1 AS ATTR2, REF_2 AS ATTR3, REF_3 AS ATTR4, REF_4 AS ATTR5, REF_5 AS ATTR6, '' AS ARRT7, '' AS ARRT8, '' AS ARRT9, '' AS ARRT10 FROM KOSCO.BCOD011 WHERE USE_GUBUN <> '0' AND GUBUN = #{mastCd} AND CODE <> '0'

SELECT 'AREA' AS MAST_CD, B.AREA_CD AS DETL_CD, A.CODE_NAME||' '||B.AREA_NM AS CD_NM_KOR, B.AREA_CD AS ATTR1 FROM (SELECT CODE,CODE_NAME FROM KOSCO.BCOD011 WHERE GUBUN = '4062' AND USE_GUBUN = '1') A, (SELECT AREA_CD, AREA_NM, AREA_GB FROM KOSCO.BSAT020 WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND AREA_CD NOT IN ('F13','I43','K25','K24','H47','H46','B14','B11','B13','N47','H49','H41','N48','C12','C13','H42','H45','H50','I40','I41','I42','H51','N46') ) B WHERE A.CODE = B.AREA_GB AND (A.CODE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR B.AREA_CD LIKE '%'|| #{searchTxt} || '%' OR B.AREA_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchTxt} ||'%' OR (CODE_NAME||' '||B.AREA_NM) LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%') ORDER BY AREA_CD

SELECT 'SCRAP_GRADE' AS MAST_CD, CODE_NAME AS CD_NM_KOR, CODE_NAME AS DETL_CD, CODE_NAME AS ATTR1 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CODE_NAME FROM KOSCO.BCOD011 WHERE GUBUN = '0906' AND USE_GUBUN = '1' ) ORDER BY CODE_NAME

SELECT A.CUST_CD, A.CAR_FULL_NO, A.CAR_NO, A.DRV_NM, A.DRV_TEL, B.CUST_NM, B.CUST_NM1 FROM STL1B2B.E_CAR A LEFT JOIN KOSCO.BBAT041 B ON A.CUST_CD = B.CUST_CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND CAR_FULL_NO LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SG, DECODE(SG,'1','사상','3','녹산','4','칠서') SG_NM, /*사업장*/ DT AS SAL_DT,/*일자*/ JNO AS SAL_JNO,/*전표*/ CUST_CD,/*거래처*/ (SELECT cust_nm FROM kosco.bbat041 b WHERE b.cust_cd = a.cust_cd) cust_nm,/*상호*/ CAR_NO,/*차량번호*/ SEND_CD, (SELECT send_nm FROM kosco.bsat021 c WHERE c.send_cd = a.send_cd) send_nm,/*직송처*/ SUBSTRB(KOSCO.FN_PROD_NM(a.PROD_CD),1,40) PROD_NM/*품명*/, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM KOSCO.BCOD011 WHERE GUBUN = '0903' AND CODE <> '0' AND USE_GUBUN <> '0' AND CODE = SUBSTR(PROD_CD,4,3)) PROD_CS, /*재질*/ SUBSTR(PROD_CD,7)PROD_GG, /*규격*/ PROD_CD, BD_QTY,/*BD*/ PS_QTY,/*PS*/ WGT,/*중량*/ RMK/*비고*/ FROM KOSCO.BSCT010 a WHERE 1 = 1 AND SG = '3' AND SUBSTR(PROD_CD,2,2) = 'ER' AND DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{fromDt}, '-') AND REPLACE(#{toDt}, '-') AND OT_GB <> '1' ORDER BY DT,JNO ) T
AND T.SAL_JNO LIKE '%' || #{jno} || '%'
AND T.CUST_CD LIKE '%'|| #{custSearchTxt} || '%' OR T.CUST_NM LIKE '%' || #{custSearchTxt} || '%'
